tika-s0403t4:2_0: 41-42. Pañcamassa paṭhame uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatehīti vā uṭṭhānena ca vīriyena ca adhigatehi.
tika-s0403t4:2_1: Tattha uṭṭhānanti kāyikaṁ vīriyaṁ. Vīriyanti cetasikanti vadanti. Uṭṭhānanti vā bhoguppādane
tika-s0403t4:2_2: yuttappayuttatā. Vīriyaṁ tajjo ussāho. Pīṇitanti dhātaṁ sutittaṁ. Tathābhūto pana
tika-s0403t4:2_3: yasmā thūlasarīro hoti, tasmā “thūlaṁ karotī”ti vuttaṁ. Dutiyaṁ uttānameva.
tika-s0403t4:5_0: 43. Tatiye appamādaṁ pasaṁsantīti “etāni āyuādīni patthayantena appamādo kātabbo”ti
tika-s0403t4:5_1: appamādameva pasaṁsanti paṇḍitā. Yasmā vā puññakiriyāsu paṇḍitā appamādaṁ pasaṁsanti,
tika-s0403t4:5_2: tasmā āyuādīni patthayantena appamādova kātabboti attho. Purimasmiṁ atthavikappe
tika-s0403t4:5_3: “puññakiriyāsū”ti padassa “appamatto”ti iminā sambandho. Yasmā paṇḍitā appamādaṁ
tika-s0403t4:5_4: pasaṁsanti, yasmā ca puññakiriyāsu appamatto ubho atthe adhigato hoti, tasmā āyuādīni
tika-s0403t4:5_5: patthayantena appamādova kātabbo. Dutiyasmiṁ atthavikappe paṇḍitā appamādaṁ pasaṁsanti.
tika-s0403t4:5_6: Katthāti? Puññakiriyāsu. Kasmāti ce? Yasmā appamatto ubho atthe adhiggaṇhāti paṇḍito,
tika-s0403t4:8_0: 44. Catutthe jhānamanena nibbattaṁ manomayanti āha “suddhāvāsesu ekaṁ jhānamanena
tika-s0403t4:8_1: nibbattaṁ devakāya”nti. Satipi hi sabbasattānaṁ abhisaṅkhāramanasā nibbattabhāve
tika-s0403t4:8_2: bāhirapaccayehi vinā manasāva nibbattattā “manomayā”ti vuccanti rūpāvacarasattā.
tika-s0403t4:8_3: Yadi evaṁ kāmabhave opapātikasattānampi manomayabhāvo āpajjatīti ce? Na, tattha bāhirapaccayehi
tika-s0403t4:8_4: nibbattetabbatāsaṅkāya eva abhāvato “manasāva nibbattā”ti avadhāraṇāsambhavato. Niruḷho
tika-s0403t4:8_5: vāyaṁ loke manomayavohāro rūpāvacarasattesu. Tathā hi “annamayo, pāṇamayo, manomayo,
tika-s0403t4:8_6: ānandamayo, viññāṇamayo”ti pañcadhā attānaṁ vedavādinopi vadanti. Ucchedavādinopi
tika-s0403t4:8_7: vadanti “dibbo rūpī manomayo”ti. Tīsu vā kulasampattīsūti brāhmaṇakhattiyavessasaṅkhātesu
tika-s0403t4:8_8: sampannakulesu. Chasu vā kāmasaggesūti chasu kāmāvacaradevesu.
tika-s0403t4:11_0: 45-46. Pañcame asaṅkheyyoti āḷhakagaṇanāya asaṅkheyyo. Yojanavasena panassa saṅkhā
tika-s0403t4:11_1: atthi heṭṭhā mahāpathaviyā upari ākāsena parisamantato cakkavāḷapabbatena majjhe
tika-s0403t4:11_2: tattha tattha ṭhitakehi dīpapabbatapariyantehi paricchinnattā jānantena yojanato
tika-s0403t4:11_4: saviññāṇakānaṁ balavāmukhapātālādīnaṁ aviññāṇakānaṁ bheravārammaṇānaṁ vasena bahubheravaṁ.
tika-s0403t4:11_5: Puthūti bahū. Savantīti sandamānā. Upayantīti upagacchanti. Chaṭṭhaṁ uttānameva.
tika-s0403t4:14_0: 47-48. Sattame saddhāti maggenāgatā saddhā. Sīlañca yassa kalyāṇanti kalyāṇasīlaṁ
tika-s0403t4:14_1: nāma ariyasāvakassa ariyakantaṁ sīlaṁ vuccati. Tattha kiñcāpi ariyasāvakassa ekasīlampi
tika-s0403t4:14_2: akantaṁ nāma natthi, imasmiṁ panatthe bhavantarepi appahīnaṁ pañcasīlaṁ adhippetaṁ.
tika-s0403t4:17: 49. Navame patitakkhandhoti sammukhā kiñci oloketuṁ asamatthatāya adhomukho. Nippaṭibhānoti sahadhammikaṁ kiñci vattuṁ avisahanato nippaṭibhāno paṭibhānarahito.
tika-s0403t4:20_0: 50. Dasame ajjhomucchitoti adhimattāya taṇhāmucchāya mucchito, mucchaṁ mohaṁ pamādaṁ
tika-s0403t4:20_1: āpanno. Tenāha “gilitvā…pe… atirekamucchāya taṇhāya samannāgato”ti. Mahaccāti mahatiyā.
